alert.note: Alert for Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 15 at 10:21PM CDT until September 15 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN RANDALL COUNTY... At 1020 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Happy, or 15 miles southeast of Canyon, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Randall County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
